tuned on.from sentence: The hyperparameters for our models were tuned on the development set for each task .

our word representations.from sentence: We initialized our word representations using publicly available 300 - dimensional Glove vectors

sentiment classification task.from sentence: For the sentiment classification task , word representations were updated during training with a learning rate of 0.1 .

semantic relatedness task.from sentence: For the semantic relatedness task , word representations were held fixed as we did not observe any significant improvement when the representations were tuned .

trained using.from sentence: Our models were trained using AdaGrad with a learning rate of 0.05 and a minibatch size of 25 .

regularized with.from sentence: The model parameters were regularized with a per-minibatch L2 regularization strength of 10 ?4 .

sentiment classifier.from sentence: The sentiment classifier was additionally regularized using dropout with a dropout rate of 0.5 .
